scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run test && npm run deploy && npm run demo && npm run destroy && npm run clean
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd src && tsc && cd .. && cp src/package.json dist/package.json && cp src/package-lock.json dist/package-lock.json && cd dist && npm install --only=prod && cd ..
scripts.demo: cd client && python3 demo.py -aws && python3 demo.py -aws -method post && cd ..
scripts.demo-local: cd client && python3 demo.py && python3 demo.py -method post && cd ..
scripts.deploy: cd cdk && npx cdk@1.86.0 deploy --outputs-file ../client/stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.destroy: cd cdk && npx cdk@1.86.0 destroy && cd ..
scripts.init: cd src && npm install && cd .. && cd cdk && npm install && cd ..
